name: Key by
description: Organize an array of items into an Object based on the Key formula

arguments.name: Array
arguments.description: Array of items to be Organized

arguments.name: Formula
arguments.description: The key formula used to index the items. The String returned from the formula will match the key in the output object

output.description: An object where each key matches a value returned by the key formula and each value is the item that string was returned for
